name: Until Death...?
description:
How long have I been here? Days? Weeks?

My world crumbled when Maddy died tragically and unexpectedly. My wife. My best friend. My soul mate.

Everything is a fog. I feel like I've been in this same room for centuries. And yet, I never noticed that ladder over there until just now.

My name is Brandon, and this is my story.

Movement:

  • A/D - Left/Right
  • W/S - Up/Down
  • Space - Jump
  • 1/2/3 - Powerups
